Detailed Description

Keyboard driver

Abstraction of the keyboard controller of a computer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Keyboard_Controller::Keyboard_Controller (  ) 

Default constructor initially turns all LEDs of and sets speed and delay of the keyboard maximal also clears the keyboard buffers.

void Keyboard_Controller::get_ascii_code (  )  [private]

Determins the ASCII code of a key according to the scancode and modifier bits.

Determins the ASCII code of a key using the scancode and modifier bits.

Definition at line 156 of file keyctrl.cc.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

bool Keyboard_Controller::key_decoded (  )  [private]

Interpretes the make and break code of the keyboard and returns an valid ASCII code, scancode and information about modifier keys like SHIFT and CTRL. Saves the decoded key in object gather.

Returns:
TRUE if character is complete otherwise FALSE.

Definition at line 57 of file keyctrl.cc.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Here is the caller graph for this function:

Key Keyboard_Controller::key_hit (  ) 

Is used to get the information of the pressed key after is has been pressed. If a scancode and ASCII code could not be determined an invalid key is returned.

Returns:
an invalid key if data transfer has not ended otherwise a valid key with every information is returned. Can be checked withd Key::valid().
